mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM(SELECT num, writer, title, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize, viewCount, regdate FROM event_mp ORDER BY num DESC) result1)
WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNum} AND rnum <= #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event_mp (num, writer, title, content, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize, viewCount, regdate) VALUES(event_mp_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{orgFileName}, #{saveFileName}, #{fileSize}, #{viewCount}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE event_mp SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, orgFileName={orgFileName}, saveFileName=#{saveFileName}, fileSize=#{fileSize}, regdate=SYSDATE WHERE num=#{num}
mapper.select: SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, content, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize, viewCount, regdate, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY num DESC) prevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY num DESC) nextNum FROM event_mp ORDER BY num DESC) result1 WHERE num=#{num}
